about_the_game:
It is a promiss for a Forever Friend!
Get it and Unlock All songs in game now~
Also will Unlock future update songs for FREE!
MUSYNX Steam version will Update Forever~
Always stay with you who love rhythm games!

All songs can be unlocked now:
Tales of Ginkgo
White Dream
I Am Shopaholic
Pink Lemon

movies.name: 简体中文 - 蒸汽平台

name: MUSYNX - Forever Friends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
